annotations.description: Brandy has been a major component of cocktails for their entire history. It was in fact one of the very first spirit being distilled in the United States, an...
annotations.title: The History Of Brandy in Five Cocktails feat. Argonaut

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Argonaut Speculator Brandy
1oz (30ml) Port
.25oz (7.5ml) Simple Syrup
Garnish Grated Nutmeg

Stir and strain into nick and nora. 
Garnish with nutmeg

title: Sangaree
